EmailTemplate.subject: Rejoin your NCS Youth Board this summer - new launch date!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}!
Missing your NCS Youth Board?
Want to do something new with them this summer?
We've got you covered...
We have rescheduled the postponed NCS Youth Board Summer 2016 Launch event! The new details are:
Date: Saturday 23rd July Time: 11:30 - 14:30 Location: Highgate Road Chapel, Chetwynd Road, NW5 1BU
We've lined up a whole host of projects that you, your NCS Youth Board mates and other Youth Boarders from across North London can get involved in! Come along on the day to reunite and find out how you can take part in the following projects this summer...
# Social media takeovers with The Challenge Society
# Event Management with Haringey Arts Festival
# NCS Dragons
# Social Action with Reaching Communities
Book your FREE ticket for the launch event HERE! (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ncs-youth-board-summer-launch-2016-tickets-26151222009)
If you can't make it to this event, don't worry! Reply to this email and we can let you know how you can still get involved.
If you would like to attend but have additional needs that require support, reply to this email to let us know.
We can't wait to see you again this summer!
The Challenge Society
